attributes.additional_details: More and more children are being home schooled because of how strict the uniform rules are, this will eventually have a impact on their social skills, mental health and confidence, children are there to learn, so teach them instead of criticising their appearance , if the kids have to wear uniform so should all the teachers, you want them to respect you but you don’t respect them? Either ban uniforms altogether or enforce it for teachers too
attributes.background: Children aren’t allowed make up, hair colour, nails , yet the teachers are ? Surely they should set an example - you should enforce all teachers to follow the same strict rules and wear a uniform see how they like the identity being stripped away from them, see how comfortable they feel
